description: The Between the Sheets is a rich, complex cocktail that starts as an easy-going&nbsp;Sidecar but diverges with just enough light&nbsp;rum and skipping the sugar rim. This two-spirit base gives it depth by merging flavors from cognac oak notes to tropical dry ones—a perfect balance for any occasion!
name: Between The Sheets
recipeIngredient: ¼ oz. Lemon juice, freshly squeezed
